channel.title: To All Rich Neopet People/RS2 Lovers
channel.description: I Am Yes, Quitting Runescape. Since My Little Sister Plays Neopets, i am thinking of converting rs money for neopet money. I Have 1000k in runescape 2 cash. According to exchange/availability 1000k runescape $ is equal to 11.3million neopets $. If you don't believe me, lets take an example. Killing A Low Level NPC Will Get You 30 Coins. Playing An Easy game on neopets (yes i have tried) will get you 330 np. *please Dont Flame*[br][size=1]Posted at: September 03, 2006, 04:26:05 PM[/size][hr]wow...0,0 people actually listened=D thanks for not flaming guys:)

item.title: To All Rich Neopet People/RS2 Lovers
item.dc:creator: @mim mim
item.description:
@mim wrote:

oh really? well i just learned something. tyvm[br][size=1]Posted at: September 03, 2006, 11:18:23 PM[/size][hr]BUT i am saying that RS money is harder to earn, thus should me more, is that in theory what you mean?

Read full topic
item.source: To All Rich Neopet People/RS2 Lovers

item.title: To All Rich Neopet People/RS2 Lovers
item.dc:creator: @HCL HCL
item.description:
@HCL wrote:

Actually, as I have heard a neopoint is worth more than a runescape gold point. I could check how they make conversions on jsp, but im lazy

I recall however being able to get several thousand neopoints/minute by playing the right games

OK, ill do the math:

1 d2jsp fg = 6 000 rsg (common ratio)
1 d2jsp fg = 1 200 np (common ratio)

1 200 np = 6 000 rsg
1 np = 5 rsg

Im under the impression that it is because neopets is more skill based in the games, and that someone who knows how to play (or script…) can get a much better amount of money for their time compared to some 7 year old, while two RS characters with an equal combat or trade skill level will be able to gather a similar amount of resource regardless of player skill.

Read full topic
item.source: To All Rich Neopet People/RS2 Lovers
